title: Jony Ive and the Transformation of Apple
itunes:title: Jony Ive and the Transformation of Apple
description:
Upon the return of Steve Jobs to Apple, Jony Ive found his role transformed. Given more freedom and authority to have innovative designs find their way into products, Ive and Jobs set out to restore Apple's reputation in the industry.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Upon the return of Steve Jobs to Apple, Jony Ive found his role transformed. Given more freedom and authority to have innovative designs find their way into products, Ive and Jobs set out to restore Apple's reputation in the industry.

itunes:keywords: Jony Ive, Jonathan Ive, Steve Jobs, Apple, iMac, iBook, Power Mac Cube, iPod, design, industrial design, marketing, personal computer, mp3 player, laptop
